description:
My place is close to Harlem Shake, Starbucks,Red Rooster, 125th St Subway one block away . You’ll love my place because of The space is beautifully designed modern kitchen fully equipped, well stocked with spices, cookware, dishes, glassware, etc. Modern new bathroom plenty of soft towels. Keyless entry for easy access upon arrival. everything you need for a comfy stay. high quality sheets, free WiFi     .

Interior design designed studio apartment with hardwood floors, 13 foot ceiling, new bath, and kitchen. The fully equipped kitchen has white quartz counter tops, White appliances including dishwasher and microwave, a toaster. Enjoy our home theater system featuring a 40" flat screen Smart TV, Netflix and Hulu, Blue tooth speakers, USB charging outlet at the desk.

Free WiFi

This private apartment accommodates two comfortably. It has a full size bed . At bed side is a USB outlet for charging you phone or tablet.

The apt is well appointed with: 
High tread count sheets, 
Duvet comforters, 
Extra pillows & Linens, 
Plenty of towels, 
Dishes, 
Glassware, 
Cutlery, 
Pots and pans, 
Spices, cooking oil, 
Hair dryer, 
First aid kit,
Iron and ironing board,
Plenty of storage., 
Heating and A/C. 
Also included is free Wi-Fi internet.
(No Elevator/Lift)

We’re in the heart of Harlem, one block from the 125th Street subway station: two minutes to Central Park (15 min walk), 15 minutes to Times Square, 18 minutes to 34th Street (Madison Square Garden, Penn Station, Macy’s, Empire State Building), 20 minutes to SoHo. Close to several bus lines and other subway lines giving quick and easy access to La Guardia Airport, Yankee Stadium, and other attractions.

On 125th Street you can find almost anything you need: Starbucks, CVS drug store, Dunkin' Donuts, Burger King, McDonald's, Subway, Staples, banks/ATMs, clothing stores. 

Major local attractions include Red Rooster, Sylvia's, Harlem Shake, the Studio Museum in Harlem, the Apollo Theater, The National Jazz Museum in Harlem, Columbia University, Whole foods Market one block away (coming soon) and many other points of interest...

No smoking in the apt. 

Early or late check-in or check-out is available (depends on visitors before or after). Please notify us prior to arrival.

Private studio apt on the 3nd floor in walk up building (No elevator/ Lift)

I'm always available via text, phone or email to answer any questions or address any issues..

The apt is one block from the 125th St subway and bus stop is right in front of the building front door
name: Elegant Studio in the Heart of Harlem
review: This was a great spot, great location, easy check in and out. I will definitely make this apartment my first choice every time l visit! Everything 100% as advertised!!
